channel.title: Weekly on Xianmin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Weekly on Xianmin's Blog

item.title: Weekly Journal of a 33-Year-Old Unemployed Rural Programmer's Self-Help Journey (4) - AI Efficiency, Income ¥1410
item.description: This article chronicles the self-help journey of a 33-year-old unemployed rural programmer. Through freelance projects including enterprise spreadsheet automation and Vue to React conversion, leveraging AI tools to improve work efficiency, he completed 8 orders earning ¥1410 in one week. The article shares experiences in remote freelancing, AI-assisted programming insights, and the importance of building client relationships, providing reference for programmers aspiring to freelance work.
